meanings.definition: A type of spore produced by basidiomycete fungi.
meanings.sent1: The basidiospores are tiny spores released by mushrooms.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study basidiospores to learn more about fungi reproduction.
meanings.sent3: The basidiospores decided to throw a party to celebrate their release.
meanings.sent4: The basidiospores danced in the air like confetti at a celebration.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the basidiospores looked like delicate seeds floating in the wind.

meanings.definition: The reproductive structure of basidiomycete fungi.
meanings.sent1: Each mushroom contains basidiospores that help in reproduction.
meanings.sent2: The basidiospores play a crucial role in the life cycle of fungi.
meanings.sent3: The basidiospores organized a race to see who could reproduce the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The basidiospores were like tiny architects building the future of the fungi kingdom.
meanings.sent5: In the forest, the basidiospores spread far and wide, ensuring the growth of new fungi.
